mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memoirs of Robert E. Lee: his military and personal history, embracing a large amount of information hitherto unpublished / by A. L. Long .. together with incidents relating to his private life subsequent to the war, collected and ed. with the assistance of Marcus J. Wright
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Book Traces Project.
Long, A. L. (Armistead Lindsay), 1827-1891
Wright, Marcus J. (Marcus Joseph), 1831-1922
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 p. l., 707 p. front., illus., plates, ports., maps (3 fold.) facsim. 25 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The appendix (p. 501-699) contains many reports, lists, etc., relating to the Army of northern Virginia.
Item X001126822 contains an inscription and marginalia.
Subject entries from the Provenance Evidence Thesaurus describe copies analyzed by Book Traces @ UVA.
